name: QuestionnaireCCARSMultipleIssuesRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Multiple Issues Rating
description: Extent to which a person experiences Anxiety symptoms, manic symptoms and attention issues such as nervousness, tension, elevated mood, distractibility, inability to concentrate.

concept.display: No disruption of daily activities. Issues are temporary, appropriate and do not impact functioning.
May persist beyond situational event, but not debilitating.
Persistent, low-level or occasionally moderate, impacts daily functioning.
Persistent and incapacitating, affecting most aspects of daily functioning.
Person is completely incapacitated by and is seemingly incapable of responding appropriately.
